text: • Eager to sign Trade Agreements even with disliked or untrusted factions
[[i]]"Song Jian may be at war with his enemies, but it doesn't mean he will stop trading with them."[[/i]]
• Chooses the most destructive option, while being aggresive.
• Protects their master's land with great tenacity.
• Protects their people, and wishes to build alliances with other factions.
• Chooses the most destructive option, while being aggresive.
• Wishes to take over land far away from their land.
[[i]]"The Xiongnu were a fear tribe by China, let's not make them forget that."[[/i]]
[[i]]"I fight for my Aunt... and Uncle of course."[[/i]]
